description: Information on a single or a set of files approval.

alias.description: An alternate short name of an item.

content.description: One sentence description of what the file or file set contains.

documentation.description: Short documenatation on how to read the file or file set.

format.description: Lists the format(s) of the file (set).

url.description: Single Uniform Resource Locator (URL) or set of URLs that points to the physical location of a file or a set of files.

isPartOf.description: Item to which this file or set of files belongs to.

isUsedIn.description: Links to method(s)/paradigm(s) in which this file (set) was used.

isProducedBy.description: Links to method(s)/paradigm(s) which produced this file (set).

focusOfStudy.description: Lists the foci (study targets) that are described/captured in this file (set).
